Tuition & Aid 














Â»
    Tuition and Financial Aid



Going to college takes a big financial commitment. But there are several types of aid that can make Chapman accessible to everyone:

Merit aid and institutional awards
Federal and state grants
Federal work study
Graduate teaching and research assistantships
Student loans
Scholarships

 
To find out about paying for your education and your financial aid options, check these resources:



Financial Aid
Our financial aid offices will help you learn more about financing your education.









      Undergraduate Financial Aid

  










      Graduate Financial Aid
  







Student Business Services
Find current tuition rates, payment plans and student health insurance.









      Undergraduate Student Business Services
  










      Graduate Student Business Services
